form.IN:
Pri 5. in 6. pomenu je oblika
less
primernik, presežnik pa je
least
: glej ustrezni gesli.

sense.def:
Stvari, ki so
little
, so majhne po velikosti ali kratke po dolžini.

seg.quote: ...a little table with a glass top.
...little groups of people.
...after he had walked for a little way.
She lay awake a little while longer.
...a little chat.

sense.def:
Otrok, ki je
little
, je še zelo mlad.

seg.quote: ...two little girls.
I often heard him do that when I was little.

sense.def:
One's little sister or brother
je mlajša sestra ali mlajši brat nekega človeka.

seg.quote: Don't bother me with little things like that.
...annoying little mishaps.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
little
tudi poudarimo, da je nečesa samo malo.

seg.quote: Little of the equipment was standardized.
There is little to worry about.
John and I had very little money left.

sense.def:
Little
pomeni tudi ne zelo pogosto ali samo v majhni meri.

seg.quote: Richardson interrupted very little.
She seemed little changed.

sense.def:
A little of something
je majhna količina nečesa.

seg.quote: The waiter poured a little of the wine into a glass.
He spoke a little French.

sense.def:
A little
ali
a little bit
pomeni v majhni meri ali nizki stopnji.

seg.quote: He frowned a little.
I felt a little uncomfortable.
I thought he was a little bit afraid.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
little by little
, se zgodi postopoma.

seg.quote: Then I learnt, little by little, the early history of her family.
